title: [Large-Scale] Microcredential-Based Job-Related Mathematical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized course for in-service elementary teachers, focusing on acquiring math teaching techniques usable during work; conducted in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Analyze actual elementary classroom cases and produce 3 or more problem-solving-based mathematics education designs
Systematically organize 5 or more differentiated instructional materials into a mathematics education portfolio
Improve mathematics activity design plans 2 or more times by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
